Flow.description:
This is a Screen Flow for Diljeet Masuda that has his preferred defaults. This flow begins by retrieving the current user's ID. It then presents a screen to input new candidate details such as name, email, gender, office location, type, and status. After collecting these details, it creates a new record in the Candidate__c object with the provided information. If the 'Schedule A Call?' option is selected, it creates a new task for follow-up.
Several objects and their fields worth mentioning. Below are the details (the format is given as: object_name - field_name: interaction) * User - Id : Retrieves the current user's ID * Candidate__c - Name, Agency__c, Email__c, First_Name__c, Gender__c, Last_Name__c, Mobile__c, Next_Step__c, Office_Location__c, OwnerId, Status__c, Type__c, personal_email__c, Candidate_Sourced_By__c, Recruiting_Source__c, Recruiting_Sub_Source__c, Attraction_Interview_Date_Scheduled__c, Attraction_Interview_Date_Completed__c, Attraction_Conducted_by__c : Stores the new candidate's information
Flow.label: New Candidate Screen Flow-Diljeet

fields.name: duplicate_candidate_error
fields.fieldText: Candidate could not be created due to a duplicate record.
